D1005: Invalid End Date. The Date format should be like these (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:ss) or  (YYYY/MM/DD HH:MM:ss) or (MM-DD-YYYY HH:MM:ss) or (MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM:ss)

D1009: Cannot Bid Lower than Original Proxy Amount
D1010: Item Id or Project Id Missing
D1050: This Item is not yet awarded
D1014: Specify the type of the bid details.It should be 'won' or 'active' or 'lost'
R1001: Some error happened. Try again later.
L0003: Specify the type of the entry you want to check.It should be  'username' or 'email' or 'phone'
L0002: Missing type. Specify type: email (or) username (or) phone.
AD001: You are not authorized to access this admin panel.
AD002: Your OTP has been mailed to your mail
AD003: Oh snap! This username already exists!
AD004: Oh snap! This project already exists!
AD005: Credentials exists for this username and project
AD006: API key, APP key notification has been mailed.
D1015: Specify the type to get the user details.It should be 'email' or 'username' or 'phone' or 'userid'

D1018: Specify the filed_names and where_condition like 'username,id' or '1,2'.where_condition values should be user_id

D1080: Alter table query format is ADD column_name data_type(length) (or) MODIFY column_name data_type(length) or DROP column_name data_type(length). Please ensure your format.
D1081: This column already exists. To modify: 'MODIFY column_name data_type(length)'; To drop: 'DROP column_name data_type(length)'
